features.name: Employee Management
features.description: CRUD operations for managing employee records including listing, creating, and viewing employees.

tasks.title: Employee List Page
tasks.description: Implement the /employees page to display a list of all employees using the EmployeeList component.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Next.js page at app/employees/page.tsx, fetch data from /api/employees (GET), display with EmployeeList. Use Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui for styling.

tasks.title: Add Employee Functionality
tasks.description: Allow users to add a new employee via a form on the /employees page.
tasks.technicalNotes: Create a form component, validate input (name, email), POST to /api/employees, update local state on success. Use useState for form state.

tasks.title: Employee API Route
tasks.description: Implement /api/employees route handlers for GET and POST requests.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Next.js Route Handlers in app/api/employees/route.ts. Store data in-memory (array of employees). Validate and handle errors.

features.name: Shift Management
features.description: CRUD operations for managing shifts including listing, creating, and viewing shifts.

tasks.title: Shift List Page
tasks.description: Implement the /shifts page to display a list of all shifts using the ShiftList component.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Next.js page at app/shifts/page.tsx, fetch data from /api/shifts (GET), display with ShiftList. Use Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui for styling.

tasks.title: Add Shift Functionality
tasks.description: Allow users to add a new shift via a form on the /shifts page.
tasks.technicalNotes: Create a form component, validate input (employeeId, startTime, endTime), POST to /api/shifts, update local state on success. Use useState for form state. Optionally, provide employee selection dropdown.

tasks.title: Shift API Route
tasks.description: Implement /api/shifts route handlers for GET and POST requests.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Next.js Route Handlers in app/api/shifts/route.ts. Store data in-memory (array of shifts). Validate and handle errors.

features.name: Application Layout & Navigation
features.description: Provide a consistent layout, header, and navigation across all pages.

tasks.title: App Layout
tasks.description: Implement a shared layout in app/layout.tsx for consistent styling and structure.
tasks.technicalNotes: Use Tailwind CSS for layout, include Header component, and ensure content is rendered via children.

tasks.title: Header Component
tasks.description: Create a Header component with navigation links to Home, Employees, and Shifts.
tasks.technicalNotes: File: components/Header.tsx. Use shadcn/ui for navigation styling. Highlight active route.

features.name: Home Page Overview
features.description: Provide an overview of the application on the home page.

tasks.title: Home Page Content
tasks.description: Implement the / page to display a summary of the app and quick links to main features.
tasks.technicalNotes: File: app/page.tsx. Include brief description, stats (e.g., number of employees/shifts), and navigation buttons.

features.name: State Management
features.description: Manage local state for employees and shifts using React hooks.

tasks.title: Implement useState/useReducer
tasks.description: Use useState and useReducer to manage local state for lists and forms.
tasks.technicalNotes: Keep state in page components; update state after API calls. Consider useReducer for complex updates (e.g., shift assignments).

features.name: Styling & UI Consistency
features.description: Apply consistent styling across all pages and components.

tasks.title: Tailwind CSS Integration
tasks.description: Configure and use Tailwind CSS throughout the app for utility-first styling.
tasks.technicalNotes: Ensure Tailwind is set up in tailwind.config.js. Use Tailwind classes in all components.

tasks.title: shadcn/ui Components
tasks.description: Leverage shadcn/ui for reusable UI elements (buttons, forms, lists).
tasks.technicalNotes: Import and use shadcn/ui components where appropriate for forms, lists, and navigation.

features.name: In-Memory Data Layer
features.description: Store all data in-memory for MVP, with clear separation for future database integration.

tasks.title: In-Memory Store Implementation
tasks.description: Implement in-memory arrays for employees and shifts in API route handlers.
tasks.technicalNotes: Keep arrays in module scope within route handler files. Add comments for future database integration.

features.name: Validation & Error Handling
features.description: Ensure all forms and API routes validate input and handle errors gracefully.

tasks.title: Form Validation
tasks.description: Validate all required fields before submitting forms for employees and shifts.
tasks.technicalNotes: Check for empty fields, valid email format, valid dates/times. Display error messages using shadcn/ui alerts.

tasks.title: API Error Handling
tasks.description: Handle invalid requests and server errors in API routes.
tasks.technicalNotes: Return appropriate HTTP status codes and error messages. Log errors to console for debugging.
